Starting at 3rd level, you harbor a wellspring of psionic energy within yourself. This energy is represented by your Psionic Energy dice, which are each a d6. You have a number of these dice equal to twice your proficiency bonus, and they fuel various psionic powers you have, which are detailed below.

Some of your powers expend the Psionic Energy die they use, as specified in a power's description, and you can't use a power if it requires you to use a die when your dice are all expended. You regain all your expended Psionic Energy dice when you finish a long rest. In addition, as a bonus action, you can regain one expended Psionic Energy die, but you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Note: This feature tracks your ability to regain a Psionic Energy die. To track your total number of Psionic Energy dice, use the feature: @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.ZiuqJbJNPDWwW8No]{Psionic Energy}. When using this feature to regain one expended energy die you must manually adjust uses on @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.ZiuqJbJNPDWwW8No]{Psionic Energy}

The powers below use your Psionic Energy dice:

  • Psi Warrior
    • @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.SvE0qsLS3Wx6B7C7]{Protective Field} (3rd level)
    • @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.VuMt8bVaGwBG0jJ5]{Psionic Strike} (3rd level)
    • @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.tr87SlDQtQ2jkUrF]{Telekinetic Movement} (3rd level)
    • @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.GHh44Iz4OG5oqDrU]{Psi-Powered Leap} (7th level)
    • @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.bR5H2QuGxLriG2IR]{Telekinetic Thrust} (7th level)
